body:
I'm so glad that Angel Goddess Angeltia hasn't been completely forgotten yet, and that there's even doujins. Sure, it has yet to be translated to english, but I'm just content that there's Angeltia doujins. Not enough love for the series if you ask me. 

Here's to hoping that there'll even be more chapters for our busy Angel Goddesses soon! Especially for Suzune.
